title: Investigate Memory Leak
description: A microservice is showing a sawtooth pattern for memory usage, and is being restarted frequently by the orchestrator.

tasks.description: Analyze the service's memory usage graph and logs to confirm the pattern of a memory leak.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the memory usage steadily grows until the service crashes and restarts.

tasks.description: Take a memory dump of the problematic service for offline analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully captures a heap dump.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority ticket for the engineering team, attaching the memory dump and performance graphs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides developers with the necessary artifacts to debug the leak.
